dataItemsList.name: Lanterna History
dataItemsList.desc:
This is a complete History of Lanterna. You are very familiar with this book since you have studied it in school. Here are the main events...

-After leaving Charn, Elos led them to this new world. \"Them\" were Derik and Elee Wendur and their four daughters and daughter's husbands.

-They, along with the other races, began to create the city of Charn.

-Elos created the Living Tree in the center of town. This tree would extend the life of a human who partook of its fruit once a year. The average life expectancy was around 250 years.

-The Mountain Dwarves live near by in the mountains and the Wood Elves and Talking Beast spread out over the land. There are many other good races brought here by Elos.

-over 20 years ago, the last of the son of Derik passed away. Zorn the Eldest son of Valdur, wanted to become king of Charn. Since Valdur was the eldest son-in-law of Derik, Zorn felt it was his right to be King. Elos had set up a government of judges, saying that Charn should never have a king if they wanted to keep their freedom.

-The people of Charn rejected Zorn's idea of setting up a monarchy. He and his followers plotted to take over the town, but were discovered and banished forever.

-Since then, people who ventured into the forest would sometimes disappear.

-Your parents were some of those who disappeared. You have since been taking care of your younger sister by working at the docks.

dataRacesList.name: Human
dataRacesList.description: Humans are a well rounded race with no special starting traits.

dataRacesList.name: Dwarf
dataRacesList.description: Dwarves make strong fighters have magic resistance of 20% and fire resistance of 10%.

dataRacesList.name: Elf
dataRacesList.description: Elves make great Wizards and Archers. They have magic resistance of 10%.

dataRacesList.name: Minotaur
dataRacesList.description: Minotaurs make good fighters and gain poison resistance of 30%. They are the only race that can select the Barbarian class.

dataRacesList.name: Badger

dataSpellsList.name: Blast of Light
dataSpellsList.description: A blast of light launches from the casters hands and automatically hits all targets in the area of effect for 2d6 points of damage.

dataSpellsList.name: Bless
dataSpellsList.description: All allies in the area of effect receive a +1 to their BAB for 5 rounds per level of the caster.

dataSpellsList.name: Fireball
dataSpellsList.description: A fireball launches from the casters hands and automatically hits all targets in the area of effect for 1d6 points of damage per caster level.

dataSpellsList.name: Flame Fingers
dataSpellsList.description: A cone of flames launch from the casters hands and automatically hit all targets in the area of effect for 1d3 points of damage per caster level.

dataSpellsList.name: Free Action
dataSpellsList.description: Removes any effects that casue the player to be held or immobile such as Hold and Web spells.

dataSpellsList.name: Hold
dataSpellsList.description: Holds one target for 3 rounds

dataSpellsList.name: Ice Storm
dataSpellsList.description: An ice storm launches from the casters hands and automatically hits all targets in the area of effect for 1d3 points of damage per caster level.

dataSpellsList.name: Lay on Hands
dataSpellsList.description: The caster heals himself or another party member for 1d2+1 hitpoints for each level after level 1 for upto 12 levels

dataSpellsList.name: Lightning
dataSpellsList.description: A lightning bolt launches from the casters hands and automatically hits all targets in the area of effect for 1d6 points of damage per caster level.

dataSpellsList.name: Mace of Stunning
dataSpellsList.description: Holds one target for 2 rounds

dataSpellsList.name: Mage Armor
dataSpellsList.description: An invisible field of force surrounds the caster, providing a +4 armor bonus to AC for 20 rounds per level.

dataSpellsList.name: Mage Bolt
dataSpellsList.description: A magic bolt of energy launches from the casters side and automatically hits a target for 1d4+1 points of damage. Additional bolts are gained for every two levels after level one. A maximum of five bolts at 9th level and beyond.

dataSpellsList.name: Magic Stone
dataSpellsList.description: Caster launches a small stone that automatically hits a target for 1d3+1 points of damage. Additional stones are gained for every two levels after level one. A maximum of five stones at 9th level and beyond.

dataSpellsList.name: Mass Minor Healing
dataSpellsList.description: Heals all party members in the area of effect for 8 HP each.

dataSpellsList.name: Minor Healing
dataSpellsList.description: The caster heals himself or another party member for 8 hitpoints

dataSpellsList.name: Minor Regeneration
dataSpellsList.description: Places a minor regeneration effect on a PC that lasts for 4 rounds giving the PC 2 hit points of healing per round.

dataSpellsList.name: Moderate Healing
dataSpellsList.description: The caster heals himself or another party member for 16 hitpoints

dataSpellsList.name: Neutralize Poison
dataSpellsList.description: Removes any poison effects from a player

dataSpellsList.name: Poison Light
dataSpellsList.description: poison of 1d2

dataSpellsList.name: Poison Medium
dataSpellsList.description: poison of 1d4

dataSpellsList.name: Resist Cold
dataSpellsList.description: Target gain 50% resistance to cold for 40 rounds

dataSpellsList.name: Resist Fire
dataSpellsList.description: Target gain 50% resistance to fire for 40 rounds

dataSpellsList.name: Sleep
dataSpellsList.description: Puts creatures to sleep for 2 rounds.

dataSpellsList.name: Spider Bite Poison Minor
dataSpellsList.description: spider bite can cause poison of 1d3 for 3 rounds.

dataSpellsList.name: Web
dataSpellsList.description: Fills a 3x3 square area with sticky spiderweds.

dataSpellsList.name: Fire Horn
dataSpellsList.description: A cone of flames launch from the fire horn and automatically hit all targets in the area of effect for 1d3 points of damage per users level.

dataSpellsList.name: Dimension Door
dataSpellsList.description: Teleport to another location on the combat map.

dataSpellsList.name: Stinking Cloud
dataSpellsList.description: a cloud of noxious gas fills the area of effect causing all living to take 1-3 points of damage each round that they remain in the area. They may also begin chocking causing them to be helpless (held).

dataSpellsList.name: Minor Rejuvenation
dataSpellsList.description: The caster rejuvenates 10 SP for themself or another party member.

dataSpellsList.name: Major Rejuvenation
dataSpellsList.description: The caster rejuvenates 20 SP for themself or another party member.

dataSpellsList.name: Acid Bolt
dataSpellsList.description: The mage fires a bolt of acid, causing 2d4+1 damage. The mage gains an extra bolt every three levels, to a maximum of 4 bolts at level 12 causing 8d4+4 damage.

dataSpellsList.name: Banshee's Wail
dataSpellsList.description: Frighten enemies with a terrifying wail.

dataSpellsList.name: Bestow Curse
dataSpellsList.description: Curses an enemy, causing -2 to all abilities and saving throws and -20% to damage resistance for 5 turns. There is no saving throw.

dataSpellsList.name: Remove Fear
dataSpellsList.description: Remove Fear removes the Frightened and other fear type effects from allies.

dataSpellsList.name: Burning Hands
dataSpellsList.description: A burning cone of flames shoots from the caster's fingers, causing 1d4+1 damage per level to a maximum of 5d4+5 at level 5.

dataSpellsList.name: Cause Disease
dataSpellsList.description: Enemy receives -1 to all stats and -1 to hit.

dataSpellsList.name: Cloudkill
dataSpellsList.description: Poisonous gas fills the area, causing 6d6+10 damage to any creature that fails a saving throw vs fortitude.

dataSpellsList.name: Defensive Stance
dataSpellsList.description: Defensive Stance provides +2 Strength, +4 Constitution, +2 Saving Throws, and +4 Armor Class for 3 turns, but the character is rooted to the spot for the duration of the spell.

dataSpellsList.name: Endure Elements
dataSpellsList.description: The caster gains a 25% resistance to cold and fire damage.

dataSpellsList.name: Explode
dataSpellsList.description: Explode

dataSpellsList.name: Fury
dataSpellsList.description: Grants +2 Strength, +2 Constitution, and +2 Will saving throws for 20 turns.... but at a cost of -2 Armour Class.

dataSpellsList.name: Golem Strength
dataSpellsList.description: Grants the target +4 strength.

dataSpellsList.name: Greater Elemental Resistance
dataSpellsList.description: The caster gains 70% resistance to cold and fire based attacks for 20 turns.

dataSpellsList.name: Heroism
dataSpellsList.description: +2 to all attack rolls and saving throws for 20 turns.

dataSpellsList.name: Insect Swarm
dataSpellsList.description: A swarm of biting insects that do damage over time and reduce the target's attack and defence by 2.

dataSpellsList.name: Mass Elemental Resistance
dataSpellsList.description: All creatures in range gain 25% resistance to cold and fire damage.

dataSpellsList.name: Minor Curse
dataSpellsList.description: Reduces a creatures attack by 1 and normal damage by 20%.

dataSpellsList.name: Poison
dataSpellsList.description: Posioned

dataSpellsList.name: Resistance
dataSpellsList.description: Provides a +1 bonus to Will for 3 turns

dataSpellsList.name: Slow
dataSpellsList.description: The target needs to make a saving throw vs will or is slowed for one turn, losing one attack per round and moving three fewer squares.

dataSpellsList.name: Slow Poison
dataSpellsList.description: Slow Poison will counter the effects of poison on allies.

dataSpellsList.name: Spit Poison
dataSpellsList.description: The mage spits out a thick poisonous bile for 1d4+1 damage at level 3, which increases by 1d4+1 per level to a maximum of 4d4+4 damage at level 7.

dataSpellsList.description: blinded

dataTraitsList.name: Bluff (L1)
dataTraitsList.description: Useful in conversations for influencing others. Uses Intelligence as a modifier.

dataTraitsList.name: Bluff (L2)
dataTraitsList.description: Useful in conversations for influencing others. Uses Intelligence as a modifier.

dataTraitsList.name: Cleave
dataTraitsList.description: Allows to make another melee attack on a near by target upon killing their first target in that same round.

dataTraitsList.name: Critical Strike
dataTraitsList.description: Use Dexterity for damage bonuses for melee attacks if dexterity is greater than strength.

dataTraitsList.name: Diplomacy (L1)
dataTraitsList.description: Useful in conversations for influencing others. Uses Charisma as a modifier.

dataTraitsList.name: Diplomacy (L2)
dataTraitsList.description: Useful in conversations for influencing others. Uses Charisma as a modifier.

dataTraitsList.description: Chance to pick a lock or disarm a trap.

dataTraitsList.name: Disable Device (L2)
dataTraitsList.description: Chance to pick a lock or disarm a trap.

dataTraitsList.name: Evasion
dataTraitsList.description: possibility to avoid area of effect damage for spells that do half damage on successful reflex check.

dataTraitsList.name: Hard to Kill
dataTraitsList.description:
The rage of battle results in a large adrenaline rush that makes them shake off pain and even death, but also makes them less precise and a little wild in their attacks.
: 50% chance to jump back up to 1/10 HpMax if HP drops below 0 (this check is made at the start of each round)
: -2 to attack rolls

dataTraitsList.name: Intimidate (L1)
dataTraitsList.description: Useful in conversations for influencing others. Uses Strength as a modifier.

dataTraitsList.name: Intimidate (L2)
dataTraitsList.description: Useful in conversations for influencing others. Uses Strength as a modifier.

dataTraitsList.name: Pick Pocket (L1)
dataTraitsList.description: Ability to try and pick the pockets of an unsuspecting target.

dataTraitsList.name: Pick Pocket (L2)
dataTraitsList.description: Ability to try and pick the pockets of an unsuspecting target.

dataTraitsList.name: Point Blank Shot
dataTraitsList.description: Allows to avoid the '-4 to attack' penalty when using a ranged weapon with enemies in adjacent squares.

dataTraitsList.name: Precise Shot (L1)
dataTraitsList.description: Gains a +1 bonus on attack and damage rolls with ranged weapons.

dataTraitsList.name: Precise Shot (L2)
dataTraitsList.description: Gains a +2 bonus on attack and damage rolls with ranged weapons.

dataTraitsList.name: Rapid Shot (L1)
dataTraitsList.description: Can make two ranged attacks per round on same target.

dataTraitsList.name: Rapid Shot (L2)
dataTraitsList.description: Can make three ranged attacks per round on same target.

dataTraitsList.name: Sneak Attack
dataTraitsList.description: when in stealth mode, melee attacks are considered sneak attacks and do more damage (+1d3 for every 2 levels).

dataTraitsList.name: Spot (L1)
dataTraitsList.description: Ability to detect traps, spot signs of enemies, etc.

dataTraitsList.name: Spot (L2)
dataTraitsList.description: Ability to detect traps, spot signs of enemies, etc.

dataTraitsList.name: Stealth (L1)
dataTraitsList.description: Ability to move undetected.

dataTraitsList.name: Stealth (L2)
dataTraitsList.description: Ability to move undetected.

dataTraitsList.name: Two Attacks
dataTraitsList.description: Allows the player to make two melee attacks per round on same target.

dataTraitsList.name: Battle Regeneration
dataTraitsList.description:
The rage of battle seems to make you stronger as the battle gets longer.
: regenerates 1 HP per round while in combat.

dataTraitsList.name: Finesse Attack
dataTraitsList.description: Use Dexterity for attack bonuses for melee attacks if dexterity is greater than strength.

dataTraitsList.name: Remove Trap
dataTraitsList.description: Used for removing traps during combat. After selecting this trait, target a trap to attempt to remove it.

dataTraitsList.name: Power Attack
dataTraitsList.description: +2 attack and damage, -2 AC for one round.

dataTraitsList.name: Sweep Attack
dataTraitsList.description: Attacks up to three adjacent enemies in one giant sweep of your weapon.

dataTraitsList.description: Chance to disarm a trap.

dataTraitsList.name: Disable Trap (L2)
dataTraitsList.description: Chance to disarm a trap.

dataTraitsList.name: Persuade (L1)
dataTraitsList.description: The ability to use charm and reason to get what you want.

dataTraitsList.name: Pick Locks (L1)
dataTraitsList.description: Ability to pick simple non-magical locks.

dataTraitsList.name: Pick Locks (L2)
dataTraitsList.description: Ability to pick complicated non-magical locks.

dataTraitsList.name: Pick Locks (L3)
dataTraitsList.description: Ability to pick advanced non-magical locks.

dataTraitsList.description: Allows the player to read creature tracks and understand their abilities and vulnerabilities.

dataTraitsList.description: Allows the player to read creature tracks and understand their abilities and vulnerabilities.

dataTraitsList.description: Allows the player to read creature tracks and understand their abilities and vulnerabilities.

dataEffectsList.name: Generic Remove Effect
dataEffectsList.description: this effect doesn't do anything. The actual Spell that uses this blank effect will be assigning which effects it will remove from the target. This blank effect is here because al spells must reference an effect tag that they use.

dataEffectsList.name: Sweep Attack
dataEffectsList.description: Attacks up to three adjacent enemies in one giant sweep of your weapon

dataEffectsList.name: Blinded
dataEffectsList.description: Blinded by triffid spit! Significant penalties to movement, attack and defence.

dataEffectsList.name: Cursed
dataEffectsList.description: Cursed! -2 to all stats and saving throws and -20% to damage resistance for 5 turns.

dataEffectsList.name: Defensive Stance
dataEffectsList.description: Defensive Stance provides +2 Strength, +4 Constitution, +2 Saving Throws, and +4 Armor Class for 3 turns, but the Dwarven Defender becomes rooted to the spot for the duration.

dataEffectsList.name: Disease
dataEffectsList.description: You have been infected by a disease, and have reduced stats.

dataEffectsList.name: Endure Elements
dataEffectsList.description: 25% resistance to cold and heat damage.

dataEffectsList.name: Fury
dataEffectsList.description: +2 Strength, +2 Constitution, and +2 Will saving throws.

dataEffectsList.name: Greater Elemental Resistance
dataEffectsList.description: 70% resistance to heat and cold damage.

dataEffectsList.name: Hasted
dataEffectsList.description: The character is hasted, gaining one attack and three additional movement squares for five rounds.

dataEffectsList.name: Healed
dataEffectsList.description: Heals 2-4 HP for every level of the Paladin up to level 10.

dataEffectsList.name: Heroism
dataEffectsList.description: +2 to attack rolls and all saving throws for 20 turns.

dataEffectsList.name: Insect Swarms
dataEffectsList.description: A swarm of biting insects! In addition to immediate damage, this causes penalties to attack and defence for 4 rounds.

dataEffectsList.name: Minor Curse
dataEffectsList.description: Minor curse! Reduces attack by 1 and standard damage by 20%.

dataEffectsList.name: Slowed
dataEffectsList.description: Character is slowed, losing one attack and 3 movement squares per round for five rounds.
